content: Should we have a central event calendar/register for all FHIR related events/connectathons? Just found out the Value-Based Care FHIR Mini-Connectathon 201704 was yesterday. :(
It's on our list of things to do for the fhir.org website. It's a question of bandwidth and resources to get it up and running.
Is it possible to use google calendar? I know you can easily embedded google calendar into web page.
would that be a problem for anyone in China?
